title: The Homage5 GT pinion in detail
content:
Frame colour
                            
                            
                                night*; warm silver*
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Suspension fork
                            
                            
                                Federgabel Fox AWL 34, Air, 120mm
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Rear shock
                            
                            
                                Fox Float Rhythm SV 165x45
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Seatpost
                            
                            
                                Dropper Post X-Fusion Manic 100; Dropper Post X-Fusion Manic 125*
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Tires
                            
                            
                                Schwalbe Super Moto-X 62-584 Reflex; Schwalbe Johnny Watts 365 60-584*
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Tubes
                            
                            
                                Schwalbe AV21
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Rims
                            
                            
                                Rodi Tryp35 Evo 27,5"
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Spokes
                            
                            
                                Sapim Leader 2,0 mm, Inox, black ( 16x ); Sapim Leader 2,0 mm, Inox, black ( 36x )
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Front hub
                            
                            
                                Novatec Boost, QR, 32H
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Rear hub
                            
                            
                                Novatec Boost, QR, 36H
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Battery
                            
                            
                                Fit BAT Tubepack 800
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Motor
                            
                            
                                Pinion E1.12 MGU
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Crankset
                            
                            
                                Samox, 165 mm
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Chain ring
                            
                            
                                39T, for Gates drive belt CDX
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Chain guard
                            
                            
                                Belt guard; Driveline Alu*
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Chain
                            
                            
                                Gates drive belt CDX
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Pinion
                            
                            
                                28T, for Gates drive belt CDX
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Saddle
                            
                            
                                Ergon SF10 Gel; Selle Royal New Lookin Male Eco*
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Pedals
                            
                            
                                VP R&M Custom; VP-538*
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Shifting system
                            
                            
                                Pinion 12 Gear
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Shifter
                            
                            
                                pinion TE1
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Handlebar
                            
                            
                                Satori R&M Custom, 25,4mm, Alu; Satori R&M Custom Komfort, 25,4 mm, Alu*
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Stem
                            
                            
                                Satori R&M Custom, cable integration, adjustable angle, Alu
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Grips
                            
                            
                                Ergon ergonomic
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Brakes
                            
                            
                                Tektro TRP HD-EU835 disc brake
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Front light
                            
                            
                                Supernova M99 Mini Pro-25
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Tail light
                            
                            
                                Supernova TL3 Pro
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Mudguards
                            
                            
                                Curana Orbit 70
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Luggage rack
                            
                            
                                Riese & Müller
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Rubber
                            
                            
                                Bibia
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Bell
                            
                            
                                Knog OI V2
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Kickstand
                            
                            
                                Ursus R90 Mooi Plus ANS
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Lock
                            
                            
                                ABUS Granit Xplus
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Pump
                            
                            
                                Beto air suspension fork pump
                            
                        

                    

                
                    

                        

                            
                                Frame size [cm]
                            
                            
                                47 cm*; 51 cm*; 56 cm*
